## Nice to meet you!

My name is Reiko and I'm a creative implementer passionate about <span class="text-info">reproducible data analysis</span>. I find a lot of joy in making sense of complex <span class="text-info">clinical and administrative data</span>, helping collaborators transform their research questions into insights through code. I'm also involved with <span class="text-info">R-Ladies Ottawa</span>, where I help organize events that make coding more accessible and create opportunities for data enthusiasts to connect in the National Capital Region. When I'm not at my computer, you'll probably find me travelling, trainspotting, or training to be on the next season of *The Amazing Race Canada*.
